root.name: [] (array access)
root.description: The array access operator is used to specify a location within an array. The data at this location can be defined with the syntax array[element] = value or read with the syntax value = array[element].

parameter.label: datatype
parameter.description: any primitive or compound datatype, including user defined classes

parameter.label: element
parameter.description: int: must not exceed the length of the array - 1
